评论概述: Not great if you intend to wear it a whole season
评论详情: The price is nice and low, but if you're looking for a primary jacket that you're going to wear for an entire season, spend a little and get something that looks better. It looks great in the advertising pictures, but the jacket itself looks like a slightly-upgraded plastic bag. If you just need an extra jacket to throw in your trunk for occasional temperature dips, this works. $10-20 more will get you something similar that looks much nicer and fits better.  Size runs large. 5'7" and 195 pounds, the large was too long and fit like a tent for me.

Well-made and fits as expected. looks nice when on. Not all bunched up like some windbreakers. It still has the rustling noise coming off the material when moving about. That is very annoying, my other jacket does not sound like this, not sure I can stand it and may need to return it.

Although this jacket is marked “frequently returned”, it’s one of the best I’ve ever owned.  The fit is perfect and it hangs beautifully on the body. I just hope it holds up well, given the Amazon caveat I mentioned above.All in all I highly recommend this jacket.
